Summary Note:
The RM met Hortense Capucine Martin at a yacht party in Paris. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Hortense Capucine Martin is a 51 year old Trading Desk Manager from France. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Hortense Capucine Martin and Lemaître have been married since 2001. Their children are named Ingrid and Louna.
Education Background:
Hortense received her secondary school diploma from Lycée Camille Claudel in 1992.
Hortense completed her university studies at University of Bordeaux in 1997.
Occupation History:
Hortense Capucine Martin is a 51 year old Trading Desk Manager from France. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Hortense Capucine Martin launched her career as a Junior Trader at EDF S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 1997 to 1998.
In 1999, she moved to EDF S.A. to work as a Senior Trader, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
She spent 23 years working as a Trading Desk Manager at ArcelorMittal S.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 780000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Toulon, Saint-Denis and Tours, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She inherited a significant sum of 860000 EUR from her grandmother, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2010, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
